title: 100 Percent Pure Organic Cucumber Eye Cream Gel 1 oz.
description: 100% Pure Organic Cucumber Eye Cream Gel brings extreme hydration and comfort to your eye area. Organic nutrients nourish your eye area as cucumber calms and brings relief to dehydrated areas. It instantly perks up tired-looking eyes.

title: Philosophy Miracle Worker Eye Cream, 0.45-Ounce
description: witness a miracle before your eyes. miracle worker miraculous anti-aging eye cream addresses advanced signs of aging around the eye area for a visibly renewed, revitalized appearance. formulated with a combination of retinoid technology and peptides, this extraordinary eye cream is clinically proven to significantly improve the appearance of deep wrinkles and lines around the delicate eye area, while improving skin elasticity and firmness. this high density eye cream deeply hydrates and helps nurture skin's natural moisture barrier to minimize moisture loss and improve skin's smoothness, while a blend of antioxidants help protect skin against environmental attack. the signs of aging are visibly reduced, giving the eye area a firmer, smoother appearance.
